data.title: Framing the Context Around Smart Objects. Between Interfaces and User Experiences
data.meta_description: This chapter delves into the transformative role of smart objects in daily life, illustrating their ubiquity and intrinsic value. It establishes a comprehensive theoretical framework that links smart objects with technology, interfaces, and user experience. Finally,...
